comments.body: I don't get it. You can set a `Buffer` as a value of `img.src`? What `Image` implementation is it? Does it work in a browser?

> You can set a `Buffer` as a value of `img.src`. 

Yes exactly. The docs say that `img.src` can be "Array of valid image sources for new Image()."

> "Does it work in a browser?"

No, `Buffer` is a nodejs type
